Yeh, gutted, plays perfect on PC.

When playing through USB on my plasma, sound is well fucked up.

What has ViSiON done to themselves? They even tried to (insanely) overcompress 5.1 AC3 audio at *192 Kbps* (32 Kbps/ch!). Wow.

This is the biggest load of fail I've ever seen from ViSiON, I didn't even believe it was from them. They are lost. I guess the writing was on the wall, though, with all their horribly over-sharpened /contrasted /saturated releases.

There are still quite a few good release groups out there. SANTi comes to mind, or FLAWL3SS. And many individuals who know what they're doing as well.
